mapper.select: SELECT TABLE_NAME AS tableName, TABLE_COMMENT AS tableComment, CREATE_TIME AS tableCreateTime, UPDATE_TIME AS tableUpdateTime FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = #{databaseName}

SELECT LOWER(dt.table_name) AS tableName, dtc.comments AS tableComment, uo.created AS tableCreateTime, uo.last_ddl_time AS tableUpdateTime FROM all_tables dt, all_tab_comments dtc, all_objects uo WHERE dt.table_name = dtc.table_name AND dt.table_name = uo.object_name AND uo.object_type = 'TABLE'
